channel.title: Los Angeles on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Los Angeles on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Where to Buy Tickets to Taylor Swift Producer Max Martin’s Musical ‘& Juliet’ in L.A.
item.description: The hit Broadway show, which just kicked off its limited Los Angeles run, features Martin’s pop hits for artists like Backstreet Boys, Britney Spears, Kelly Clarkson and Céline Dion.

item.title: Where to Buy Tickets to Taylor Swift Producer Max Martin’s Musical ‘& Juliet’ in L.A.
item.description: The hit Broadway show, which just kicked off its limited Los Angeles run, features Martin’s pop hits for artists like Backstreet Boys, Britney Spears, Kelly Clarkson and Céline Dion.

item.title: Max Martin’s Musical ‘& Juliet’ Debuts in L.A. as Taylor Swift Album Excitement Builds
item.description: “We were able to learn so much from him,” Rachel Webb, who stars in the touring production of the hit Broadway musical, tells The Hollywood Reporter of working with the prolific producer.

item.title: Max Martin’s Musical ‘& Juliet’ Debuts in L.A. as Taylor Swift Album Excitement Builds
item.description: “We were able to learn so much from him,” Rachel Webb, who stars in the touring production of the hit Broadway musical, tells The Hollywood Reporter of working with the prolific producer.

item.title: French Sneaker Brand VEJA Opens First West Coast Storefront in Venice Beach
item.description: Located on Abbot Kinney Boulevard, the new space merges the brand’s Parisian roots with the neighborhood’s laidback California vibes.

item.title: French Sneaker Brand VEJA Opens First West Coast Storefront in Venice Beach
item.description: Located on Abbot Kinney Boulevard, the new space merges the brand’s Parisian roots with the neighborhood’s laidback California vibes.

item.title: Trump Takes on L.A. Olympics: Plans to Lead Task Force on 2028 Games (Exclusive)
item.description: The president is preparing to announce a task force on the 2028 Summer Games in Los Angeles amid tensions between the city and the White House.

item.title: Trump Takes on L.A. Olympics: Plans to Lead Task Force on 2028 Games (Exclusive)
item.description: The president is preparing to announce a task force on the 2028 Summer Games in Los Angeles amid tensions between the city and the White House.

item.title: Trump Takes on L.A. Olympics: Will Lead Task Force on 2028 Games (Exclusive)
item.description: The president is announcing that he’ll lead a task force on the 2028 Summer Games in Los Angeles amid tensions between the city and the White House.

item.title: Trump Takes on L.A. Olympics: Will Lead Task Force on 2028 Games (Exclusive)
item.description: The president is announcing that he’ll lead a task force on the 2028 Summer Games in Los Angeles amid tensions between the city and the White House.

item.title: Mass Shooting in Los Angeles Kills Two People and Injures Six After Music Festival
item.description: The arrest of the alleged shooter has not yet been made public after a fatal shooting.

item.title: Why It’s Taking LA So Long to Rebuild After the Wildfires
item.description: Reforming California’s environmental rules is only a small step to rebuilding Los Angeles after the fires in January.

item.title: Why It’s Taking LA So Long to Rebuild After the Wildfires
item.description: Reforming California’s environmental rules is only a small step to rebuilding Los Angeles after the fires in January.

item.title: Gold’s Gym Opens Flagship Location at Beverly Center in Los Angeles
item.description: Designed as an “elevated” fitness experience, the new Gold’s location features Atlantis Strength equipment, a “glute factory,” a turf training zone, in-house juice bar, sauna, steam room and more.
